alert.note: Alert for Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 1:48PM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph producing areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...North Park, and Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions along with areas of poor visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet
